content:
Mark asking some interesting questions on Twitter
https://twitter.com/Soodesune/status/1419139782047932418?s=19

@healthbjk do you know if USCDI has specifications for the EOB data elements? It looks like the CMS 9115-F authors deferred to USCDI on that one, and I’m finding not all payers are including important things like “quantity” on a pharmacy EOB.

- Mark Lorenz (@Soodesune)
